titles.title: Flatside Wilderness Additions Act
Flatside Wilderness Additions Act
Flatside Wilderness Additions Act
To designate the Flatside-Bethune Wilderness in the Ouachita National Forest, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-869.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 710.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Flatside Wilderness Additions Act
This bill adds specified lands to the Flatside Wilderness in the Ouachita National Forest in Arkansas. The bill also redesignates the wilderness as the Flatside-Bethune Wilderness.
